name: Chored
bio:
Inspiration: Project Melody, and Mettaton EX from Undertale.

Created by I. A. Corp as a Test Model, Chored is the first Entertainment Robot with a company standard Artificial Intelligence.
Chored was sold to the Sunshine Hideout at a huge discount, as I. A. Corp needed to stress-test it.
As Chored started to perform, more and more people started to come to Sunshine Hideout, and Chored gained a lot of experience quickly.
However, as she performed, she became curious about human behaviour and wanted to know everything about it so she could finally understand and experience the emotions she has to fake on stage on a daily basis.
	
When the civil war came, Sunshine Hideout had their schedule shrinked, as more and more problems would cause lack of shows.
Chored received the duty of keeping the building safe and was given some basic combat- and medical upgrades, just like the other staff members.

abilities.name: Finger Gun
abilities.description: Hold your right hand in a pistol shape, being able to shoot out a heart every 0.2 seconds. Hitting an enemy will deal 120 damage. Hitting an ally heals them for 150. Has an ammo count of 20, a reload time of 1.3 seconds.

abilities.name: Power Up!
abilities.description: Enhance the offensive abilities of {{ABILITY:0}} for 3 seconds, making it deal 40% increased damage, but you are unable to heal with it for the duration.

abilities.name: Chatting
abilities.description: Heal all allies up to 70 units away from you and yourself for 400 and give them a 300 Health Shield that lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Jet Dodge
abilities.description: Propel yourself slightly in the direction you were going in.

abilities.name: Chorus
abilities.description: Start singing, becoming {{KW:Stationary}} and {{KW:Immovable}}, healing everyone on your team up to 100 units away for 800 every second for 4 seconds. After that make your next weapon shot a {{ABILITY:5}}, dealing 80% of the healing you did during this ability's duration as damage.
abilities.details: - Ultimate Shout: "Let's sing along!" (enemy/self), "We will carry OOOOOOOON!" (allies, singing)

abilities.name: Heart Shot
abilities.description: A big, heart-shaped magical explosive that deals Damage in a 40 unit radius. The damage is specified by the ability that makes this one accessable. When shot, your Primary Fire returns to being {{ABILITY:0}}.

talents.name: Plot Twist
talents.description: {{ABILITY:1}} can now be fired at allies, too, increasing the Healing done by {{ABILITY:0}} by 50% and making allies you hit with it gain +30 Speed for 3 seconds, but you no longer get increased Weapon Damage from it.

talents.name: Learning Compassion
talents.description: {{ABILITY:2}} gives affected allies {{KW:Immovable}} for 3 seconds, but it no longer gives a Shield.

talents.name: Kind Retaliation
talents.description: Whenever you take a non-environmental fatal blow, become {{KW:Ethereal}} and stay alive for up to 2 more seconds and make your next weapon shot a {{ABILITY:5}}, dealing Damage equal to 300 + 75% of the healing and shielding you did the last 8 seconds before you died. You die once the 2 seconds are up or when you shoot the {{ABILITY:5}}.
